results.title: I didn't know you could tie
results.creator_credit: D. Keith Carlson and WGBH Educational Foundation
results.brief_description:
Episode number 3 of Series “The Kindergarten child series”.
A child is assisted by the teacher to clarify her feelings about another child sho is engaged in an independent activity. The child’s inappropriate criticism is mildly reprimanded.

results.title: How many members in a set
results.creator_credit: D. Keith Carlson and WGBH Educational Foundation
results.brief_description:
Episode number 4 of Series “The Kindergarten child series”.
Children are presented with a variety of materials through which to learn mathematical concepts. The teacher invites several children to group small toy cars into various sets and endeavours to lead them to the abstract notion of members of a set. From here the film then moves around the class and observes the activities of other children with the material offered them.
results.creator_credit_for_label: D. Keith Carlson and WGBH Educational Foundation

results.title: Group Activities
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “The Kindergarten child series”.
A group of children is presented with some common household materials with which to create things, as the basis for an art lesson. The teacher’s intent is to stimulate individual thought and effort without attempting to pre-determine their efforts.

results.title: The Gathering drum
results.creator_credit: D. Keith Carlson and WGBH Educational Foundation
results.brief_description:
Episode number 3 of Series “The Kindergarten child series”.
At the beginning of the kindergarten day children are encouraged to move freely and choose from a variety of play objects. A drumbeat then brings them together to be introduced to the day’s activities.

results.title: Free play and music
results.brief_description:
Episode number 1 of Series “The Kindergarten child series”.
Children are encouraged to select toys or materials which interest them, each child directing his own activity with the objects. Music periods involve singing accompanied by physical participation.

results.title: Discussion
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “The Kindergarten child series”.
Intending to stimulate language development and curiosity, and enlargement of concepts, understanding, the teacher introduces some human vertebrae and discusses their relation to the human form, allowing the children to handle the bones. For preschool eduction.

results.title: Did you forget I'm five?
results.brief_description:
Episode number 2 of Series “The Kindergarten child series”.
Begins with a discussion of general interest to the children - the origin and structure of corn on the cob, related activities including the preparation and cooking of corn follow.
